title: Dragon's Breath Elixir
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, ultra-detailed, cinematic lighting, a close-up shot of a person (cultivator/sage) dressed in rich, detailed Xianxia robes pouring milk from an elaborate bronze pitcher shaped like a Chinese dragon head. The milk forms flowing, ethereal streams of latte art or spiritual energy (Qi) above a delicate white porcelain cup. The cup rests on a floating stone island covered in moss, pink lotus flowers, and ancient, gnarled bonsai trees. In the majestic 16:9 background: a massive Xianxia mountain range with towering cliffs, cascading waterfalls, and traditional multi-tiered Chinese temple architecture (cultivation sect palace) bathed in soft golden sunrise light and mist. Ethereal atmosphere, volumetric lighting, magical motes of light floating in the air. (16:9 aspect ratio).
